casebody.data:
Murray
v.
University of NC at Chapel Hill 124A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Laura H. McHenry, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly D. Potter, Special Deputy Attorney General, Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, for University of North Carolina At Chapel Hill. Henry Clay Turner, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Murray, Jillian.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of October 2016 by State of NC for Withdrawal of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
